name: Crane of Duty
description:
It's the year 2030, humanity is extinct, rope does not exist and AI cranes build empty cities. You are one of these cranes.

Controls:
A, D: Crane Rotation
W, S: Tractor Beam Forwards and Backwards
Q, E or Mouse Scroll: Tractor Beam Up and Down
Left Ctrl/F, Left Shift/R: Crane Arm Up and Down
Space/Left Mouse: Pick Up/Put Down



Made by a team of 4 in about 16 hours.
Xavier, Stan, Julin, Mia
